: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus Prime: I mean once we have our Nightlight back as herself. She would understand that we need to lock her up while she was a Pred.

Just then Elita's cry brought Rodimus' attention to her. He raised her so he could see her face.

Rodimus Prime: Whatsa' matter, little one?

He tickled her.

<P><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: </STRONG>Whatsa' matter, little one?</P>
<P>He tickled her.</P>
